name: Ghastly Cleanup
description:
Introduction

This game was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2. We are a programmer and artist couple. We wanted to take a shot at making our first game, we created developed all assets, graphics and sounds. Hope you enjoy it.

Gameplay Instructions:

Make your way through the haunted school, and clean up ghosts with your vacuum, use your magic flashlight to spot the ghouls. Click once to stun them. Hold down to Vacuum them.

Keyboard+Mouse Controls:

Move- WASD, arrow keys
Aim - Mouse
Vacuum - Left click or spacebar

Gamepad Controls:

Move - Left stick, D-pad
Aim - Right stick
Vacuum - Right shoulder buttons
